data.title: Slavik Markovich
data.meta_description: Slavik Markovich is the chief executive officer and co-founder at Descope. A serial entrepreneur, Markovich is passionate about solving hard technology problems. Before Descope, Markovich was co-founder and chief executive officer at Demisto, a leader in the SOAR industry that was acquired by Palo Alto Networks, where he then served as senior vice president of products. Prior to co-founding Demisto, Slavik was vice president and chief technology officer of database technologies at McAfee (Intel Security).
data.text: Slavik Markovich is the chief executive officer and co-founder at Descope. A serial entrepreneur, Markovich is passionate about solving hard technology problems. Before Descope, Markovich was co-founder and chief executive officer at Demisto, a leader in the SOAR industry that was acquired by Palo Alto Networks, where he then served as senior vice president of products. Prior to co-founding Demisto, Slavik was vice president and chief technology officer of database technologies at McAfee (Intel Security). He joined McAfee via the acquisition of Sentrigo, a database security startup, where he was a co-founder and served as chief technology officer. Markovich is an investor in dozens of startups and serves as a board member and advisor to several security startups as well.
